name: Death To All Cubes
description:
Death To All Cubes is a short single player third person shooter set in a realm where shapes inhabit the lands. 

Take control of a harmless genetically created cube named Cubey and bring death to all cubes?

Story Mode

The Cubes, a "violent" race from the shape realms have invaded the hex realm. 

Cubey is tasked by the Cylinder King to kill all cubes before they can deal any more damage to the shape realms. 

Cubey must keep his wits about him though as all may not be as it seems …

Wave Mode

Take on 10 enduring waves of Cubes. Each wave gets progressively harder as Cubey makes his way through the onslaught of Cubes.

Whilst Cubey may have a lot of health but lots of health doesn't mean the fight will be easy. 

Bullets come at a premium in wave mode. Sacrifice a portion of Cubey's health to gain more bullets to continue the fight. 

Crates drop from the sky every so often containing vital med kits and extra bullets to help Cubey when the fight gets tough.
